title: iowatch
summary: Android Wear watchface inspired by a Google I/O talk.
description: Minimalistic Android Wear watch face inspired by a Google I/O talk.http://i.imgur.com/ELY80tT.pngTroubleshooting:Sometimes it takes a little while to install new watch faces over a slow Bluetooth connection. Wait at least a few minutes after installing on phone, by then watch face should be installed on the watch as well. Try reinstalling or re-syncing all apps to the watch if it still fails. This unfortunately affects all third party watch faces on Android Wear.Suggestions and feature requests are welcome!GitHub repository: https://github.com/FruitieX/iowatch
descriptionHTML:
Minimalistic Android Wear watch face inspired by a Google I/O talk.

http://i.imgur.com/ELY80tT.png

Troubleshooting:
Sometimes it takes a little while to install new watch faces over a slow Bluetooth connection. Wait at least a few minutes after installing on phone, by then watch face should be installed on the watch as well. Try reinstalling or re-syncing all apps to the watch if it still fails. This unfortunately affects all third party watch faces on Android Wear.

Suggestions and feature requests are welcome!
GitHub repository: https://github.com/FruitieX/iowatch
comments: Shrink Ring just a bit I was very disappointed when I installed this face for use on my Moto 360. The bottom where 6 o'clock is is covered.
recentChanges: Made the lines in ambient mode thinner to minimize screen burn-in risk and improve battery life.
